title: Packet loss PLS HELP
body:
I keep spiking to 180 ping from 70 and animations wont happen, you'll just be sucked into a blitzcrank. How do I fix this?

I'm running 5G wireless.

replies.body:
It honestly sounds like the main issue might be some sort of Packet Loss.  The easiest way to check to see what the problem is, is to use our [Connection Analyzer Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader).  It'll look at your past few games and let me know the health of your connection.  If there are problems such as packet loss, it'll give you some additional solutions on how to prevent it!

Feel free to reply back if none of those steps seem to help!
